Name:
* NED finished third but one of the riders (Aad van den Hoek) failed a doping test and the team was disqualified. No bronze medals were awarded. 




Men's Road race team - Cycling - Munich 1972 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     Men's team time trial event was a part of the road cycling programme. The race was contested over app. 100 km and the teams raced against the clock. The official time for each team was the time for the third rider to pass the finish line. Event facts: Men's Road race team competition was held at the Radstadion, Olympiapark and 35  teams participated in the event. 





These results for Men's Road race team - Munich 1972 Summer Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database
